settingsDescription: Manage application settings, import XML files, and configure appearance.
appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of the application.
languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.
importXmlFilesDescription: Upload XML files directly to their respective locations within {dirPath}. Ensure files are correctly formatted Cisco IP Phone XML. The filename (without .xml) will be used as its ID. The application expects structural directories like 'zonebranch', 'branch', 'department' and 'mainmenu.xml' to be in lowercase.
importOverwriteWarning: Importing files will overwrite existing files with the same name in the target directory. Please ensure you are uploading the correct files.
importZoneBranchXmlDescription: Upload an XML file for a specific zone (e.g., ZonaEste.xml). It will be saved in {dirPath}/zonebranch/.
importDepartmentXmlDescription: Upload one or more XML files for specific departments/localities. Files will be saved in {dirPath}/department/.
addLocalityDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new locality. This will create a new XML file and update the zone file.
editLocalityDialogDescription: Change the name of this locality. This will update the zone file and rename the department XML file.
addExtensionDialogDescription: Enter the details for the new extension. This will update the locality's XML file.
extensionNumberInvalid: Extension number must contain only digits.
addBranchDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new branch. This will create a new XML file in the Branch directory and update the zone file.
editDialogGeneralDescription: Change the name of this item. This will update the parent XML file and rename the corresponding XML file if the ID changes.
confirmDeleteDescription: This action will delete the {itemType} "{itemName}" (ID: {itemId}). This action cannot be undone.
noItemsMatchSearch: Your search for "{searchTerm}" did not match any {itemType}.
noItemsFoundInZone: No {itemType} found in this zone. You can add new ones using the button above.
noExtensionsAvailable: No extensions currently available for {localityName}. You can add new ones using the button above.
extensionListCaption: A list of all extensions for {localityName}.
generalSettingsDescription: Manage general application settings like appearance and language.
dataManagementForBranchDescription: Localities for the {branchName} branch (within {zoneName} zone) are managed by editing the XML file at [ivoxsdir_root]/branch/{branchId}.xml. Ensure this file contains <MenuItem> tags representing each locality. Deleting a locality here will remove it from this list and attempt to delete its department XML.
editExtensionDialogDescription: Modify the details for this extension. This will update the locality's XML file.
extensionUpdateNoChange: No changes detected for the extension.
extensionUpdateConflict: An extension with the new name and number already exists.
networkServiceUrlConfigDescription: Configure the Host IP/Hostname and Port for URLs embedded in your XMLs (mainmenu.xml, zonebranch/*.xml, branch/*.xml) within {dirPath}. This is only relevant if IP phone service is used directly from this app.
networkSettingsInfo: This updates URLs in mainmenu.xml, zonebranch/*.xml, and branch/*.xml files located within {dirPath}.
hostCannotBeEmpty: Service Host IP/Hostname cannot be empty.
portInvalid: Service Port must be a valid number.
directoryConfigurationDescription: Specify the absolute root path where your 'ivoxsdir' XML directory structure is located. The application will read XML files from this path. Ensure structural directories like 'zonebranch', 'branch', 'department' and the 'mainmenu.xml' file are in lowercase within this path.
directoryPathInfo: The application will read XML files from this root. Ensure the subfolders (zonebranch, branch, department) and mainmenu.xml exist here and are lowercase.
directoryPathMustBeAbsolute: Directory path must be an absolute path.
